name: Legend of Lagoda
description:
Legend of Lagoda is an indie RPG, with a 16 bit graphics style. The gameplay takes inspiration from a classic JRPG style, made famous by games as Dragon Quest IV, Lunar: Silver Star Story, and Chrono Trigger.

Game features:
* 16 bit graphic style
* A vast world to explore
* 7 diferent Characters to play
* Open gameplay based on exploration
* World based on slavic and nordic tales
* Lots of wonder, adventure and exploration

An early version demo (playtime around 1-2  hours) is now avaible for download.
